""We will make special shots for you and give you welcome drinks as we would like you guys to enjoy as this would look great for our club on a ladies night""- were his words.I confirmed with Sachin even on the day of the party in the afternoon & he confirmed the same. 1409641680 54056cd60d0cee4a2cfd0cf9 2930794 932928 1 "Bms Tig" https://www.zomato.com/users/bms-tig-2930794 "Club Pangaea happens to be one of the worst clubs when it comes to the behavior and dialect of the employees at the entrance. They are extremely rude and biased towards certain people as noticed by me during my visit last weekend. Having visited clubs in almost all major cities in India
column2: I feel club Pangaea is certainly over rated and the concerned authorities should keep a check on their employees. The service quality at the entrance is very poor and i was shocked to see that the entry fees vary from person to person since the employees at the gate are busy pleasing their biases. I wonder what the entry rules are (if any). Also i would like to know how much the entry fees is (since it varies from person to person). Extremely unprofessional and biased policies make this club a must-not-visit. I would recommend people to visit other clubs in the city who understand how to behave with guests. I hope the authorities do something regarding this." 304655 "2014-06-22 13:39:00" 1 Poor https://www.zomato.com/review/NLyqZ 2 1403424540.0

1409641680 54056cd70d0cee4a2cfd0cfc 1090567 931954 908 P.K. https://www.zomato.com/peeyooshkaushik "When Club Pangaea opened it was the place everyone was talking about and the place everyone wanted to go to. I on the other hand am a chronic party person so I don't really think that much and just go find a place to party and enjoy myself. One thing that does stand out at Club Pangaea at The Ashok is surely the hospitality.The waiters and bar tenders are trained to be very courteous and very fast. When we order drinks or repeat drinks they come almost immediately. The best part is the atmosphere it is really relaxed and it is one of the most chilled out night clubs with decent music you will find in Delhi.I like it very much and after find myself with a large group of friends at Club Pangaea in Delhi. The one downside is that there is a lot of security and it can be a slightly disrupting feature but I guess that is important in a way so I am willing to overlook that
column2: they should just try to tone it down a little.http://peeyooshkaushikphotography.blogspot.in/" 304655 "2014-06-22 09:55:32" 155 Good https://www.zomato.com/review/LlXKD 1 1403411132.0

1409641680 54056cd80d0cee4a2cfd0d06 405808 806726 46 "Shaurya Deep" https://www.zomato.com/FoodPorn123 "One of the most beautiful and upscale clubs located at Ashoka hotel. Literally it's the heart beat of the delhi party scene. Went there with cousins on the first ever bollywood night at Club Pangea. The place had a majestic colonial and uber modern mix decor.the wooden floors
column2: the beautiful Renaissance paintings and wall to wall purple checkered cushion walls enhanced the beauty of the place. The Victorian glass chandeliers and beautiful red wall lights were adding to the magnanimity of the place.The sound system was out of the world and had the constant thump. The music was flawless the perfect blend of commercial and bollywood kept the night going on and on.Prices as expected were high for drinks. A pint of kingfisher ultra for Rs 500. I might suggest pre drinking before coming to the club but still the place had its vibe I still ended up spending a bomb on drinks :)But you won't be disappointed by the place at all and it should be visited. Can't wait to go again!!!" 304655 "2014-05-26 19:47:43" 14 Legendary https://www.zomato.com/review/wGqYK  1401113863.0
